document.full_text: broadway musical producer john cossette, who also followed in his father's footsteps to stage the grammy telecasts and other entertainment award specials, has died at age of 54, his family said.
document.title: grammy, broadway producer john cossette dies at 54
lines_and_colors: broadway musical producer john cossette, who also followed in his father's footsteps to stage the grammy telecasts and other entertainment award specials, has died at age of 54, his family said.
